promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple chameleon psychic-type pokemon holding a dark whip. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptail, a a chibi cute simple chameleon psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Sensitive Ray, Clamp. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "psychic" or "Cryptail". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, chameleon-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: This elusive creature thrives in hidden tombs, using Sensitive Ray to detect intruders while using its Clamp ability to meld with shadows. Its unassuming charm masks a cunning adversary.
